name: FV Reworked (Nightmode)
description: A dark overhaul of Furvilla's site theme based on FV Nightmode Redesigned and includes elements of FV Battling. Tested with Chrome & Firefox. Please read the additional info for installation options, an important note about villager and user profiles, credits, and more. Latest update: 1.3.6, click here for an imgur album of screenshots.
additional_info:
. . . Current Version: 1.3.7 Last Code Update: July 7, 2020 (screenshot album) READ ME:
  • • This is my own personal site style that I maintain for fun, and that I've uploaded here since I thought others might enjoy it. You are free to do whatever you want with it including reskin it to your own tastes or use it as a base for your own Furvilla site theme; all I ask is that you leave a link to this style and to FV Battling somewhere in the description.
  • • This style does not affect user profiles or villager profiles by default (aside from hiding ads). If you want to change this, all you have to do is disable custom css in your user settings onsite and change the first code block's REGEXP (the long string at the bottom that says 'applies to') from (http|https)://www\.furvilla\.com/(?!(villager/[0-9]*(?:\?|$)|profile/[0-9]*(?:\?|$))).* to (http|https)://www\.furvilla\.com/.* (visual instructions)
  • • Report Bugs Here
  • • User forum style colors are overwritten, but the font size/weight are still user-defined.
  • • You need to have an active villager set in order for the extra 10 villagers to be condensed down into 2 villagers + careers per row. Without an active villager, it'll just display like the site default.
  • • Image assets are hosted on PostImage, and the full changelog is hosted on Paste.ee
Compatibility:
  • YES: • Furvilla Speed Eating • CuteHornyUnicorn's WYSIWYG editor • The price checker userscript • FVToolkit-Sidebar (Right Column), my modification of FVToolkit-Sidebar that adds more villagers to the 'More Villagers' widget in the sidebar. You need an active villager set in order for it to function properly, and can change the # of villagers shown on the sidebar by editing the labeled number in the code.
  • NO: • FV Battling • FVToolkit-Sidebar • FV Nightmode Redesigned
Credits:
  • • The battle code is largely inspired by and contains elements from FV Battling userstyle. (I made part of its code a part of this style due to the fact that the original style's code doesn't work with how this style changes the site layout; it needed significant editing in order to not break the battle page.)
  • • Code for the background animations is from FV Nightmode Redesigned
  • • Color theme is largely inspired by FV Nightmode Redesigned
  • • Custom image assets used in the style are hosted on PostImage, and the full changelog is available on pastebin.
Changelog: (see full changelog here) 1.3.7 | 7/9/2020
  • • The Grande Tourney festival page fixes.
1.3.6 | 6/25/2020
  • • Very minor bugfixes: fixed flee span's broken position that and changed the black font color of the career subtitle on user profile villager list (for when custom css is disabled).
1.3.5 | 11/16/19
  • • Bigger explore & explore event buttons.
  • • Recipes known for cooks, blacksmiths, etc are now centered when there's less than 3 recipes in a line.
1.3.4 | 11/07/19
  • • Sidebar is now accessible when the modal is open.
  • • Fixed default panel styling so things like reports are actually readable now.
  • • Fixed battles getting broken by really small windows (this bug is still present in furvilla's default css).
  • • Added compatibility for the price checker userscript.
1.3.3 | 11/01/19
  • • Added compatibility fix for the WYSIWYG editor userscript.
  • • Added scrollbar to the alternate loot styling.
  • • Removed junk section i forgot to get rid of.
1.3.2 | 10/30/19
  • • Added installation option for battle attack animation; you can partially disable it, disable it completely, or leave it as Furvilla's default.
  • • Finally added faster scrapping from FV Battling.
  • • Removed useless spacing in the style header.
1.3.1 | 10/29/19
  • • Added installation option to disable or enable the animated background.
  • • Decided to make the vista background a darker purple, even if it makes some vistas look bad. The white was too bright compared to everything else.
1.3.0 | 10/28/19
  • • Finally sat down and removed all that extra whitespace in the site content after removing the right sidebar.
  • • Greatly condensed the extra villagers in the right sidebar.
  • • As a result of reducing the content size, I spent time fixing up the @media queries for different window sizes.
  • • Reworked battle and warrior career page formats to fit better within the smaller content size.
  • • Fixed issue with tourney buttons messing up warrior career page spacing.
  • • Fixed forum vista text issues and added a darker text shadow to vista links in order to improve readability.
  • • Tweaked PM formatting.
1.2.2 | 10/24/19
  • • Added styling to move the loot over the defeated enemy so you don't have to scroll to see what you got. You can disable this by customizing your installation.
  • • Fixed issue with stall search having a large margin for no reason due to outdated code that I forgot to remove.
  • • Fixed brightness filter not applying properly to search bar when the input is focused.
  • • Added position sticky to the serpent pot npc image for fun.
1.2.1 | 10/23/19
  • • Condensed warrior career page; now you can see health/exp/charges without scrolling.
  • • Filter should no longer apply to direct links to images (it should only apply to images actually within the site layout now).
  • • Added media query so continue battle button won't go off page if the window height is less than 600px tall.
  • • Battleground selection is now a scrollbox and has a max height.
  • • Added small color fix for compatibility with FV speed eating.
1.2.0 | 10/23/19 | (see this imgur screenshot album for visual examples)
  • • Overhaul to battling to be similar to the current iteration of FV battling, including disabling the loading animation. Added short fade in animation to some elements.
  • • Added adjustments to sidebar for smaller window sizes.
  • • Tooltips, dropdowns, and inputs were updated to have dark color schemes.
  • • Swapped the base link color because the pink wasn't standing out enough for my liking; links are now a light blue.
  • • Moved notifications to the right alongside the sidebar and gave them fixed positioning.
  • • Standardized stalls and galleries to look more like the inventory page; they were previously using the darker theme used for career recipes.
  • • Base/recolors and costume previews will now stick and remain visible as you scroll if your browser supports position sticky.
  • • Fixed shop stock height issues in Cozy Cookery, Quest shop, etc.
  • • Finally fixed the house decorating issue caused by the fixed position right sidebar.
  • • Styled Halloween brew to have same layout as the Serpent Pot (+ other very minor Halloween fixes).
  • • Removed chat styling and sickness text fix because /chat and sickness don't exist anymore.
  • • Fixed animation issues in chrome relating to circle villager avatars.
  • • Fixed button and focused pagination color issues.
  • • Set custom highlight color (pink background with black text).
  • • Replaced the checkbox image with a darker version.
  • • Fixed minor issue with text color on 'buy furdollars' page.
  • • Fixed image issues relating to costume museum preview (it's kind of bright now as a result).
  • • Updated all background image links from HTTP to HTTPS.
  • • Restored focus outline to battle log.
  • • Cleaned up code a little bit.
